name: Faith Link (Skyrata)
description:
Heloise and Abelard are madly in love. Unfortunately, their families do not share their enthusiasm.
They decide to ask for help from the senile shaman who lives near the cave at the borders of the Kingdom.
In order to test their love, he decided to curse them in order to force them to perform tests together to escape his domain.
If they succeed, they will live forever side by side..
